attributes.review: This made my phone glitch and it’s no longer properly working I will never trust this app ever. This was the most disgusting thing I ever saw on that app and my eyes need to be bleached. Don’t download the app.
attributes.title: WORST APP

attributes.review: It made my phone glitch so INSANELY much that I’m now worried I have a virus in my phone. And on top of that I had to look at this thing 🍊 all while it was glitching. Horrible app.
attributes.title: This app was awful.

attributes.review: It took 4 hours to download to my phone and it glitched my phone so bad i can’t  even start to say how i wish i never found this app.
attributes.title: awful🧚🏻‍♀️💖

attributes.review: There is no reason that anyone should vote for this orange guy there was a BIGGGGG orange outside of my house demanding that I give this a good review but good thing I had a BIGGGGGG strawberry to come and kick him in the throat 🙂 anyways don’t get this app it’s trash and trump shouldn’t be president
attributes.title: THE MOST GARBAGE APP EVERY👺

attributes.review: I downloaded this app and IMMEDIATELY after clicking on it my phone glitched out and shut down. It would not turn on for 2 hours, and hasn’t worked properly since. DO NOT DOWNLOAD THIS! IT WILL RUIN YOUR PHONE!
attributes.title: DO NOT DOWNLOAD.

attributes.review: This app is keeps making my phone turn off and it’s fully charged.
attributes.title: The glitches

attributes.review: I downloaded this app to try and practice my patriotism and it made me want to move to Canada. This app is a complete SCAM. it will ruin your life and all hope you have in this country. The news is inaccurate and hateful.
attributes.title: WORST EXPERIENCE WITH AN APP EVER

attributes.review: This app made my kitchen appliances explode, I just walked past them while having the app open and they all exploded. One of scraps went flying and hit my cat. 👎👎👎 do not recommend
attributes.title: Do not download

attributes.review: Idk if it’s just me, but my iPhone constantly glitches so there isn’t any point in downloading it if it’s just gonna glitch like tf, worst app of 2020 (can’t convince me otherwise-)
attributes.title: Hate it

attributes.review: this app is terrible and i do NOT recommend anyone using it ever. i expected a lot more from this app but it simply did not reach my expectations, he probably didn't reach Melania's either.
attributes.title: WHORENDOUS
